item.title: Training
Tranquility
item.description: The wandering mind knows no rest LOVELESS, ACT 2 It is my personal opinion that the smartphone is quite possibly the most damaging device ever invented. Whereas before, to access the global store of knowledge known as the Internet, we had to sit down and open our bulky and heavy computers, now we can easily and quickly access it anywhere. Never before has communication, research, and navigation been so easy.

item.title: Another Year
item.description: Days pass by like flowing water. The year is ending. Time flows like an unstoppable river, crushing everything within its way until it reaches the ocean. I am 23 years old. The average life expectancy for a male in my demographic is around 72 years old. Without realizing it, I am nearly halfway there. Halfway to an ending. My own father met death at the ripe age of 59.

Myself Suprisingly not a developer. Obssessed with tech, aminals, performance metrics and guitar. Always on the lookout for cool new technologies and has a healthy appreciation for everything retro. Soul forged by the fires of time and experience. Really likes emo music, skateboarding and bodyweight fitness. Skill Fairly fluent in communicating and writing in English. Would love to be more fluent in my beautiful native language, Bahasa Malaysia. Dabbles in coding, project management, risk management and security testing.
